en.title: Tissue engineering
en.library_recommends: • "Tissue engineering / senior ed.: Clemens van Blitterswijk ... [et al.]". Year:2008. ISBN:978-0-12-370869-4

free_text.Bibliographie et matériel: Tissue Engineering, Senior Editor: Clemens van Blitterswijk, Academic Press Series in Biomedical Engineering, Elsevier London
free_text.Forme d'enseignement: Course ex cathedra and tissue engineering personal projects.[br/]Exercises (personal projects preparation) supervised by Prof. Frey and Dr Engelhardt
free_text.Contenu: 1) Introduction into TE, Prof. Frey[br/]2) Fetal TE, Prof. Feitz, Nijmwegen[br/]3) Urogenital TE, Prof. Frey[br/]4) October: Skin TE, Dr.Grasset, EPFL[br/]5) Matrices for TE and biological reaction, Prof. Hilborn, Uppsala[br/]6) Lung and Gut TE, Prof. Frey[br/]7) Bioreactors in TE, Dr. Eva-Maria Engelhardt[br/]8) Esophageal TE, Dr. Amulya Saxena, Graz[br/]9) Cartilage and bone TE, NN[br/]10)Growth factors in TE, Prof. Jenny Southgate, York[br/]11)Fibrin Technology in TE, Kristen Lorentz[br/]12)Project presentations, Students TE class[br/]13)Pancreas TE, Prof. Hubbell[br/]
free_text.Objectifs d'apprentissage: Introduction to tissue engineering in general and in particular to organ tissue engineering.[br/]Personal projects in tissue engineering.
